TopicTitle: * i wish something smarter than usual hello *

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I am veggero. They are vegetarian, Italian, not conspiracy etc. but these are minor things.

More important I can tell you (and I love ksp) are extremely nagging, boring, and I do bad jokes. Always. These are some negative things about me.

The positive things are.

My skill in ksp is legendary. Maybe. I do not know.

They are particularly focused on the sandbox (ever returned from the moon in his career, out of the soi kerbin not talk about it) and I'm not really too bad in this mode. I went on the two moons, dune & return eve & enough, and finally Jool. But I can do more. At the time I prepare to do eve & return. Usually I focus on rockets to send into orbit a payload.

My age I prefer not to publish it. I'm a guy, I say.

I am using google translator, so I hope that you understand everything.

Hey, don't worry. I can understand your post just fine!

If you're already lining up for Eve return, you've got quite a lot of experience under your belt. Or you're crazy. Or you just don't care and are going to over-engineer the crud out of the thing.

I'll go with the first option.

Welcome to the forum!

Well, just look who's here!

Edited August 24, 2015 by Euclide
Willkommen! Post a picture of your most 'legendary' craft? Can we do that here?

welcome to the forums!

And don't worry for your "bad" jokes: I am known to make (very) bad puns
Welcome! (and gratzi for joining) Have a great time, I think there are also some areas with other languages, you can check it out there.
